name: TraceLine
description: The TraceLine class is a 3D rendering component in JSMacros that represents a line drawn from a screen position to a world position.
overview:
The `TraceLine` class provides a way to draw lines from 2D screen coordinates to 3D world positions:
- Draws a line from a screen position to a world position
- Customizable line color with alpha transparency support
- World-space positioning for precise targeting
- Integration with the Draw3D rendering system
- Builder pattern for fluent configuration

constructors.signature: new TraceLine(double x, double y, double z, int color)
constructors.description: Creates a new TraceLine from the screen center (0, 0) to the specified world coordinates with a color.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the target world position

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the target world position

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the target world position

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: ARGB color value for the line

constructors.signature: new TraceLine(double x, double y, double z, int color, int alpha)
constructors.description: Creates a new TraceLine from the screen center (0, 0) to the specified world coordinates with separate color and alpha.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the target world position

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the target world position

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the target world position

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: RGB color value for the line

constructors.description: Creates a new TraceLine from the screen center to the specified world position using a Pos3D object.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: The target world position as Pos3D

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: ARGB color value for the line

constructors.signature: new TraceLine(Pos3D pos, int color, int alpha)
constructors.description: Creates a new TraceLine from the screen center to the specified world position using a Pos3D object with separate alpha.

parameters.name: pos
parameters.description: The target world position as Pos3D

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: RGB color value for the line
